# Problem sets

Dr. Jenny Smetzer has written labs/problems sets that accompany ModernDive:

1. PS01: Introduction to R
1. PS02: Data visualization with `ggplot2`
1. PS03: Data wrangling with `dplyr`
1. PS04: Regression with one numerical variable
1. PS05: Regression with one categorical variable
1. PS06: Regression with one numerical and one categorical variable
1. PS07: Sampling distributions
1. PS08: Confidence intervals and the bootstrap
1. PS09: Hypothesis testing
1. PS10: Inference for regression (coming soon!)
